en.content: If the range of the function $ f(x) = \frac{5-x}{x^2 - 3x + 2} , \ x \neq 1, 2, $ is $ (-\infty , \alpha] \cup [\beta, \infty) $, then $ \alpha^2 + \beta^2 $ is equal to :
en.explanation:
$$\begin{aligned} & y=\frac{5-x}{x^2-3 x+2} \\ & y x^2-3 x y+2 y+x-5=0 \\ & y z^2+(-3 y+1) x+(2 y-5)=0 \end{aligned}$$

Case I : If $y=0$ (Accepted)

$$\Rightarrow x=5$$

Case II : If $y \neq 0$

$$\begin{aligned} & \mathrm{D} \geq 0 \\ & (-3 y+1)^2-4(y)(2 y-5) \geq 0 \\ & 9 y^2+1-6 y-8 y^2+20 y \geq 0 \\ & y^2+14 y+1 \geq 0 \\ & (y+7)^2-48 \geq 0 \\ & |y+7| \geq 4 \sqrt{3} \\ & \Rightarrow y+7 \geq 4 \sqrt{3} \text { or } \mathrm{y}+7 \leq-4 \sqrt{3} \\ & \Rightarrow \mathrm{y} \geq 4 \sqrt{3}-7 \text { or } \mathrm{y} \leq-4 \sqrt{3}-7 \end{aligned}$$

From Case I and Case II

$$y \in(-\infty,-4 \sqrt{3}-7] \cup[4 \sqrt{3}-7, \infty)$$

$$\begin{aligned} & \text { So } \alpha=-4 \sqrt{3}-7 \\ & \quad \beta=4 \sqrt{3}-7 \\ & \begin{aligned} \Rightarrow a^2+b^2 & =(-4 \sqrt{3}-7)^2+(4 \sqrt{3}-7)^2 \\ & =2(48+49) \\ & =194 \end{aligned} \end{aligned}$$

hi.content: यदि फलन $f(x)=\frac{5-x}{x^2-3 x+2}, x \neq 1,2$, का परिसर $(-\infty, \alpha] \cup[\beta, \infty)$ है, तो $\alpha^2+\beta^2$ बराबर है :
hi.explanation:
$$\begin{aligned} & y=\frac{5-x}{x^2-3x+2} \\ & yx^2-3xy+2y+x-5=0 \\ & yz^2+(-3y+1)x+(2y-5)=0 \end{aligned}$$

Case I : यदि $y=0$ (स्वीकार्य)

$$\Rightarrow x=5$$

Case II : यदि $y\neq 0$

$$\begin{aligned} & D\ge 0 \\ & (-3y+1)^2-4(y)(2y-5)\ge 0 \\ & 9y^2+1-6y-8y^2+20y\ge 0 \\ & y^2+14y+1\ge 0 \\ & (y+7)^2-48\ge 0 \\ & |y+7|\ge 4\sqrt{3} \\ & \Rightarrow y+7\ge 4\sqrt{3}\text{ या }y+7\le -4\sqrt{3} \\ & \Rightarrow y\ge 4\sqrt{3}-7\text{ या }y\le -4\sqrt{3}-7 \end{aligned}$$

Case I एवं Case II से

$$y\in(-\infty,-4\sqrt{3}-7]\cup[4\sqrt{3}-7,\infty)$$

$$\begin{aligned} & \text{अतः }\alpha=-4\sqrt{3}-7 \\ & \quad \beta=4\sqrt{3}-7 \\ & \begin{aligned} \Rightarrow a^2+b^2 &=(-4\sqrt{3}-7)^2+(4\sqrt{3}-7)^2 \\ &=2(48+49) \\ &=194 \end{aligned} \end{aligned}$$

en.content: If the domain of the function $f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{10+3 x-x^2}}+\frac{1}{\sqrt{x+|x|}}$ is $(a, b)$, then $(1+a)^2+b^2$ is equal to :
en.explanation:
$$x+|x|= \begin{cases}2 x, & x \geq 0 \\ 0, & x<0\end{cases}$$

$\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{x+|x|}}$, domain is $x>0$, as $2 x \neq 0$

Similarly,

$$\begin{aligned} &\frac{1}{\sqrt{3 x+10-x^2}} \text { is defined when } 3 x+10-x^2>0\\ &\begin{aligned} \Rightarrow & x^2-3 x-10<0 \\ & (x-5)(x+2)<0 \\ \Rightarrow & x \in(-2,5) \\ \Rightarrow & \text { Domain will be }(0, \infty) \cap(-2,5)=(0,5) \\ \Rightarrow & (1+a)^2+b^2=1+25=26 \end{aligned} \end{aligned}$$

hi.content: यदि फलन $f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{10+3 x-x^2}}+\frac{1}{\sqrt{x+|x|}}$ का प्रांत $(\mathrm{a}, \mathrm{b})$ है, तो $(1+\mathrm{a})^2+\mathrm{b}^2$ बराबर है :
hi.explanation:
$$x+|x|= \begin{cases}2x, & x\geq 0 \\ 0, & x<0\end{cases}$$

$\Rightarrow$ $\displaystyle\frac{1}{\sqrt{x+|x|}}$ का परिभाषा क्षेत्र $x>0$ है, क्योंकि $2x\neq0$।

इसी प्रकार,

$$\begin{aligned} &\displaystyle\frac{1}{\sqrt{3x+10-x^2}}\text{ तब परिभाषित है जब }3x+10-x^2>0\\ &\begin{aligned} \Rightarrow\ &x^2-3x-10<0 \\ & (x-5)(x+2)<0 \\ \Rightarrow\ &x\in(-2,5) \\ \Rightarrow\ &\text{अतः परिभाषा क्षेत्र }(0,\infty)\cap(-2,5)=(0,5) \\ \Rightarrow\ &(1+a)^2+b^2=1+25=26 \end{aligned} \end{aligned}$$

en.explanation:
$\frac{2 x-3}{4 x+5}>0$

$\begin{aligned} & \therefore \quad x \in\left(-\infty,-\frac{5}{4}\right) \cup\left(\frac{3}{2}, \infty\right) ........(i) \\ & -1 \leq \frac{3 x+4}{2-x} \leq 1 \\ & \frac{3 x+4}{2-x} \leq 1 \\ & \Rightarrow \quad \frac{3 x+4}{2-x}-1 \leq 0\end{aligned}$

$\begin{aligned} & \Rightarrow \quad \frac{3 x+4-2+x}{x-2} \geq 0 \\ & \Rightarrow \quad \frac{4 x+2}{x-2} \geq 0 \\ & \Rightarrow \quad x \in\left(-\infty,-\frac{1}{2}\right] \cup(2, \infty)........(ii)\end{aligned}$

$$ \begin{aligned} & \frac{3 x+4}{2-x} \geq-1 \\ \Rightarrow & \frac{3 x+4}{2-x}+1 \geq 0 \\ \Rightarrow & \frac{3 x+4+2-x}{2-x} \geq 0 \\ \Rightarrow & \frac{2 x+6}{x-2} \leq 0 \\ \therefore & x \in[-3,2)........(iii) \end{aligned} $$

Taking intersection of (i), (ii) and (iii)

$$ \begin{aligned} & x \in\left[-3,-\frac{5}{4}\right) \\ & \alpha=-3, \beta=-\frac{5}{4} \\ & \alpha^2+4 \beta=4 \end{aligned} $$

hi.content: यदि फलन $f(x)=\log _e\left(\frac{2 x-3}{5+4 x}\right)+\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{4+3 x}{2-x}\right)$ का प्रांत $[\alpha, \beta)$ है, तो $\alpha^2+4 \beta$ बराबर है
hi.explanation:
$\frac{2x-3}{4x+5}>0$

$\begin{aligned} &\therefore\quad x\in\Bigl(-\infty,-\tfrac{5}{4}\Bigr)\cup\Bigl(\tfrac{3}{2},\infty\Bigr)\dots\dots\dots\dots(i)\\ &-1\le\tfrac{3x+4}{2-x}\le1\\ &\tfrac{3x+4}{2-x}\le1\\ &\Rightarrow\quad\tfrac{3x+4}{2-x}-1\le0\end{aligned}$

$\begin{aligned} &\Rightarrow\quad\tfrac{3x+4-2+x}{x-2}\ge0\\ &\Rightarrow\quad\tfrac{4x+2}{x-2}\ge0\\ &\Rightarrow\quad x\in\Bigl(-\infty,-\tfrac{1}{2}\Bigr]\cup(2,\infty)\dots\dots\dots(ii)\end{aligned}$

$$\begin{aligned} &\tfrac{3x+4}{2-x}\ge-1\\ \Rightarrow&\tfrac{3x+4}{2-x}+1\ge0\\ \Rightarrow&\tfrac{3x+4+2-x}{2-x}\ge0\\ \Rightarrow&\tfrac{2x+6}{x-2}\le0\\ \therefore&x\in[-3,2)\dots\dots\dots(iii)\end{aligned}$$

(i), (ii) तथा (iii) के छेदन पर

$$\begin{aligned} &x\in\Bigl[-3,-\tfrac{5}{4}\Bigr)\\ &\alpha=-3,\;\beta=-\tfrac{5}{4}\\ &\alpha^2+4\beta=4\end{aligned}$$

en.content: Let the domains of the functions $f(x)=\log _4 \log _3 \log _7\left(8-\log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)\right)$ and $\mathrm{g}(x)=\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{7 x+10}{x-2}\right)$ be $(\alpha, \beta)$ and $[\gamma, \delta]$, respectively. Then $\alpha^2+\beta^2+\gamma^2+\delta^2$ is equal to :
en.explanation:
$f(x)=\log _4\left(\log _3\left(\log _7\left(8-\log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)\right)\right)\right.$

$$\begin{aligned} & \log _3\left(\log _1\left(8-\log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)\right)\right)>0 \\ & \log _7\left(8-\log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)\right)>1 \\ & 8-\log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)>7 \\ & -\log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)>-1 \\ & \log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)<1 \\ & x^2+4 x+5<2 \\ & x^2+4 x+3<0 \\ & \Rightarrow(x+3)(x+1)<0 \quad \ldots(1) \\ & \log _7\left(8-\log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)\right)>0 \\ & 8-\log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)>1 \\ & \log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)<9 \\ & x^2+4 x+5<2^9 \\ & x^2+4 x+5<512 \\ & \Rightarrow x^2+4 x-507<0 \\ & \Rightarrow x=-4 \pm \sqrt{16+2028} \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} & x=\frac{-4 \pm \sqrt{2044}}{2} \quad\text{..... (2)}\\ & \Rightarrow\left(x-\left(\frac{-4+\sqrt{2044}}{2}\right)\right)\left(x-\left(\frac{-4-\sqrt{2044}}{2}\right)\right)<0 \\ & x^2+4 x+5>0 \\ & D>0 \\ & x \in R \\ & \text { Also, } 8-\log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)>0 \\ & \log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)<8 \\ & x^2+4 x+5<256 \\ & \Rightarrow x^2+4 x-251<0 \\ & \Rightarrow x=-4 \pm \sqrt{16+1004} \\ & \Rightarrow x=\frac{-4 \pm \sqrt{1020}}{2} \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} &\Rightarrow\left(x-\left(\frac{-4+\sqrt{1020}}{2}\right)\right)\left(x-\left(\frac{-4-\sqrt{1020}}{2}\right)\right)<0\\ &\therefore \text { Intersection of (1), (2) and (3) } \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} & \therefore x \in(-3,-1) \\ & -1 \leq \frac{7 x+10}{x-2} \leq 1 \\ & \Rightarrow x \in[-2,-1] \\ & \therefore \alpha^2+\beta^2+\gamma^2+\delta^2=(-3)^2+(-1)^2+(-2)^{-2}+(-1)^2 \\ & =9+1+4+1 \\ & =15 \end{aligned}$$

hi.content: माना फलनों $f(x)=\log _4 \log _3 \log _7\left(8-\log _2\left(x^2+4 x+5\right)\right)$ और $g(x)=\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{7 x+10}{x-2}\right)$ के प्रांत क्रमशः $(\alpha, \beta)$ और $[\gamma, \delta]$ हैं। तो $\alpha^2+\beta^2+\gamma^2+\delta^2$ बराबर है :
hi.explanation:
$f(x)=\log_{4}\bigl(\log_{3}\bigl(\log_{7}\bigl(8-\log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)\bigr)\bigr)\bigr)$

$$\begin{aligned} & \log_{3}\bigl(\log_{1}\bigl(8-\log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)\bigr)\bigr)>0 \\ & \log_{7}\bigl(8-\log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)\bigr)>1 \\ & 8-\log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)>7 \\ & -\log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)>-1 \\ & \log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)<1 \\ & x^2+4x+5<2 \\ & x^2+4x+3<0 \\ & \Rightarrow (x+3)(x+1)<0 \quad \ldots(1) \\ & \log_{7}\bigl(8-\log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)\bigr)>0 \\ & 8-\log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)>1 \\ & \log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)<9 \\ & x^2+4x+5<2^9 \\ & x^2+4x+5<512 \\ & \Rightarrow x^2+4x-507<0 \\ & \Rightarrow x=-4 \pm \sqrt{16+2028} \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} & x=\frac{-4 \pm \sqrt{2044}}{2} \quad\text{..... (2)}\\ & \Rightarrow\bigl(x-\tfrac{-4+\sqrt{2044}}{2}\bigr)\bigl(x-\tfrac{-4-\sqrt{2044}}{2}\bigr)<0 \\ & x^2+4x+5>0 \\ & D>0 \\ & x \in R \\ & \text{इसके अलावा, }8-\log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)>0 \\ & \log_{2}(x^2+4x+5)<8 \\ & x^2+4x+5<256 \\ & \Rightarrow x^2+4x-251<0 \\ & \Rightarrow x=-4 \pm \sqrt{16+1004} \\ & \Rightarrow x=\frac{-4 \pm \sqrt{1020}}{2} \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} & \Rightarrow\bigl(x-\tfrac{-4+\sqrt{1020}}{2}\bigr)\bigl(x-\tfrac{-4-\sqrt{1020}}{2}\bigr)<0\\ & \therefore \text{(1), (2) और (3) का छेदन} \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} & \therefore x \in(-3,-1) \\ & -1 \leq \frac{7x+10}{x-2} \leq 1 \\ & \Rightarrow x \in[-2,-1] \\ & \therefore \alpha^2+\beta^2+\gamma^2+\delta^2=(-3)^2+(-1)^2+(-2)^{-2}+(-1)^2 \\ & =9+1+4+1 \\ & =15 \end{aligned}$$

en.content: Let $f, g:(1, \infty) \rightarrow \mathbb{R}$ be defined as $f(x)=\frac{2 x+3}{5 x+2}$ and $g(x)=\frac{2-3 x}{1-x}$. If the range of the function fog: $[2,4] \rightarrow \mathbb{R}$ is $[\alpha, \beta]$, then $\frac{1}{\beta-\alpha}$ is equal to
en.explanation: $$\begin{aligned} & g(2)=4, g(4)=\frac{10}{3} \\ & f \text { is decreasing in }\left(\frac{10}{3}, 4\right) \\ & \therefore \quad \alpha=f(4)=\frac{1}{2} \\ & \beta=f\left(\frac{10}{3}\right)=\frac{29}{56} \\ & \frac{1}{\beta-\alpha}=\frac{1}{\frac{29}{56}-\frac{1}{2}}=56 \end{aligned}$$

hi.content: माना $f, g:(1, \infty) \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, f(x)=\frac{2 x+3}{5 x+2}$ और $g(x)=\frac{2-3 x}{1-x}$ द्वारा परिभाषित हैं। यदि फलन $f \circ g:[2,4] \rightarrow \mathbb{R}$ का परिसर $[\alpha, \beta]$ हे, तो $\frac{1}{\beta-\alpha}$ बराबर हे
hi.explanation:
$$g(2)=4,\quad g(4)=\frac{10}{3}$$

$$f\text{ उस अंतराल }\left(\tfrac{10}{3},4\right)\text{ पर अवरोही है}$$

$$\therefore\quad \alpha = f(4)=\tfrac{1}{2}$$

$$\beta = f\bigl(\tfrac{10}{3}\bigr)=\tfrac{29}{56}$$

$$\frac{1}{\beta-\alpha}=\frac{1}{\tfrac{29}{56}-\tfrac{1}{2}}=56$$

en.content: Let $f$ be a function such that $f(x)+3 f\left(\frac{24}{x}\right)=4 x, x \neq 0$. Then $f(3)+f(8)$ is equal to
en.explanation:
$$\begin{aligned} & f(x)+3 f\left(\frac{24}{x}\right)=4 x, x \neq 0 \quad \ldots(1)\\ & \text { replace } x \text { by } \frac{24}{x} \\ & f\left(\frac{24}{x}\right)+3 f\left(\frac{24}{24}\right)=4\left(\frac{24}{x}\right)=\frac{96}{x} \quad \ldots(2) \\ & 3 \times(2)-(1) \\ & \Rightarrow 8 f(x)=\frac{96.3}{x}-4 x \Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{36}{x}-\frac{x}{2} \\ & f(3)+f(8)=\left(12-\frac{3}{2}\right)+\left(\frac{36}{8}-4\right) \end{aligned}$$

$=8+\frac{36}{8}-\frac{12}{8}=11$

hi.content: माना एक फलन $f$ के लिए $f(x)+3 f\left(\frac{24}{x}\right)=4 x, x \neq 0$ है। तो $f(3)+f(8)$ बराबर है
hi.explanation:
$$\begin{aligned} & f(x)+3 f\left(\frac{24}{x}\right)=4 x,\; x\neq 0\quad\ldots(1)\\ & x\text{ को }\frac{24}{x}\text{ से प्रतिस्थापित करें}\\ & f\left(\frac{24}{x}\right)+3 f\left(\frac{24}{24}\right)=4\left(\frac{24}{x}\right)=\frac{96}{x}\quad\ldots(2)\\ & 3\times(2)-(1)\\ & \Rightarrow 8 f(x)=\frac{96\cdot3}{x}-4 x\;\;\Rightarrow f(x)=\frac{36}{x}-\frac{x}{2}\\ & f(3)+f(8)=\left(12-\frac{3}{2}\right)+\left(\frac{36}{8}-4\right) \end{aligned}$$

$=8+\frac{36}{8}-\frac{12}{8}=11$

en.content: If the domain of the function $f(x)=\log _7\left(1-\log _4\left(x^2-9 x+18\right)\right)$ is $(\alpha, \beta) \cup(\gamma, o)$, then $\alpha+\beta+\gamma+\hat{o}$ is equal to
en.explanation:
$$\begin{aligned} & 1-\log _4\left(x^2-9 x+18\right)>0 \\ & \log _4\left(x^2-9 x+18\right)<1 \\ & x^2-9 x+18<4 \\ & x^2-9 x+14<0 \\ & x \in(2,7) \\ & x^2-9 x+18>0 \\ & x \in(-\infty, 3) \cup(6, \infty) \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} & x \in(2,3) \cup(6,7) \\ & \alpha+\beta+\gamma+\delta=18 \end{aligned}$$

hi.content: यदि फलन $f(x)=\log _7\left(1-\log _4\left(x^2-9 x+18\right)\right)$ का प्रांत $(\alpha, \beta) \cup(\gamma, \delta)$ है, तो $\alpha+\beta+\gamma+\hat{o}$ बराबर है:
hi.explanation:
$$ \begin{aligned} &1-\log_4\bigl(x^2-9x+18\bigr)>0\\ &\log_4\bigl(x^2-9x+18\bigr)<1\\ &x^2-9x+18<4\\ &x^2-9x+14<0\\ &x\in(2,7)\\ &x^2-9x+18>0\\ &x\in(-\infty,3)\cup(6,\infty) \end{aligned}$$

$$ \begin{aligned} &x\in(2,3)\cup(6,7)\\ &\alpha+\beta+\gamma+\delta=18 \end{aligned}$$
